sense.def:
Kadar žuželka, žival ali rastlina
stings someone
, povzroči, da človek občuti ostro bolečino, ko ga zbode v kožo, navadno s strupom.

seg.quote: Bees do not normally sting without being provoked.

sense.def:
The sting of an insect or animal
je del telesa žuželke ali živali, ki nas piči ali zbode.

seg.quote: They paralyse their victims with their stings.

sense.def:
A part of one's body stings
rečemo, kadar v delu telesa občutimo močno bolečino.

seg.quote: The fire smoked glumly and stung our eyes.
...the sting of ashes in his eyes.

sense.def:
Kadar človekove pripombe
sting someone
, nekoga vznemirijo in jezijo.

seg.quote: I wondered why I'd said it, knowing it would really sting him.
He made a stinging attack on Taverne.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
takes the sting out of a situation
, neke okoliščine naredi manj boleče ali neprijetne.

seg.quote: He smiled to take the sting out of his words.
